choices: he continues along the beach
he goes into the forrest
adventureing can wait, Chopper is hungry!
he finds an animal village!
other choices*
1.content:
groaning, Chopper sat up. last he knew, the reindeer was sleeping on board with all his nakama. he looked around him... it looked like the beach of an island of some sort... but where was everyone! he called out all of their names... but no response.

sighing he decided to check out the island.
1.title: begining of Chopper's BIG adventure!

choices: an orca worming it's way onto land?
a bloated walrus, eating opther walruses!
a crate of food!? and candy yet!
some fat, lazy mer-people
other choices*
11.content: continuing along the beach, Chopper finds...
11.title: he continues along the beach

choices: about an hour later, Chopper has managed to eat all the contents of the crate!
chopper notices a group of other animals, and sees if they want some too
*free choice!
113.content: smiling happily, the Reindeer eagerly began to dig through the candy to find all that was in it. lucky for him, there was a lot of cotton-candy flavored goodies. after checking to make sure it was safe, because it was out in the open, he nodded happily, as the food was in perfect condition. "yummy!" Chopper cried gleefully, and began to eat the candy before him.
113.title: what luck!

choices: Fat Candy! (Regular Weight Gain)
Slob Candy! (He gains weight and is a slob
Blob Candy! (He becomes immobile very quickly)
1131.content:
*Burp!*
"Ah! That was good!" Said Chopper, rubbing his brown, furry belly. He had managed to eat all of the candy in that crate, every last morsel. Chopper's belly was now stuffed, and it looked like he had gained 10 pounds, which, considering that he was 20 pounds to begin with, is quite a feat. Little did Chopper know, however, that he had eaten a special candy! He had, in fact, eaten...
1131.title: about an hour later, Chopper has managed to eat...

choices: he sees a bunch of animals, worshipping a fat wolf!
a well-fed warthog resting beside a log
a pack of hungry-looking wolves!
a bunch of chubby animals walking/waddleing up to him
other choices*
12.content: deciding the forest might be interesting, chopper walks into it. after a while he notices...
12.title: reindeer in the forest

choices: to begin training for challenging vulper
to challenge the king right now!
to show this village just how much he could eat!
to see if the king is hungry... if there's no risk, then it's ok
other choices*
14.content:
Chopper is simply amazed! he found a village of animals!

"looking for something?" a voice asks.

whirling around, chopper sees a very fat rat smiling at him. the rodent is so fat it has made him as tall as chopper! the rodent has disproportionately short arms and legs. "yeah, but uhh... how can you all talk human? and walk upright!? there's only one human-human fruit!"

"hmmm... oh, you must be a devil-fruit user! well, I'm not sure how, but all the animals that live on and near our island can speak and think like a human! I'm the village leader, Rattat." he smiles. nodding chopper shakes the creature's paw. "there are only a few villages in our island. and we chiefs all follow the rule of our king."

"king?" chopper asked, suspicious of kings, the reindeer wanted to be sure if this one was ok.

"yes, king Vulper. he's a wolf, and he will eat you if he thinks your tasty looking." seeing the reindeer's nervousness, the rat added, "but no-worries, being eaten on this island is different. you wake up later in one piece."

"uhh... if you say so... why is he your king anyway?" chopper asked.

"oh, lord vulper, you mean? well, he can eat more than anyone else, that's why."

"huh!?"

Rattat smiled, "on our island, anyone who can eat a lot is highly regarded. if you can eat more than anyone else, you are proclaimed the island's king! also, if you can eat a lot, you are respected more, especially by the females of our island."

nodding the reindeer smiled and decided...
14.title: he finds an animal village!

info.brief_description: Tony Tony Chopper gets lost... and hungry!
info.description:
this story is centered around Tony Tony chopper. it is about him landing on a mysterious island with odd animals. the animals seem to either want to eat, be eaten by or feed the reindeer. can our fuzzy friend last? can he find his nakama again, and will he escape the island... or will he want to leave the island... let's find out...


[rules/regulations:
no great amounts of blood.
no hard vore.
no other straw hat pirates, unless I give permission (e-mail me) and even if they are added, they are not to be involved in vore without my say-so as well
no female vore (exceptions include: so far)
no death
-other rules pending-]

thanks for your cooperation! on to the story!

(remember, any questions, e-mail me) ^^
